amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for alternative energy programs in the bill by $115,520,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 86 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce funds in Title IV the Research, Development, Test and Evaluation and increase Defense by $115,520,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pompeo amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 109 - 320 (Roll no. 44).
